name: Snakes and Lasers (Saahil Talha)
description:
Snakes and Lasers. The game you never knew you needed. I mean, the original snake game is pretty cool and all, but honestly, it just didn't have enough lasers for my tastes. So, why not fix it?

--Instructions--

=> Just like the original Snake Game

=> Arrows to control the snake

=> Be CAREFUL to not turn too quickly, as you will die!

=> Collect the white pellets to increase your score and length [high score is set high for reasons, you never accomplished it]

=> Avoid hitting yourself, lasers, bullets, and the walls.

=> Make A History in World High Score

=> Have fun and let me the score [with a screenshot] in the comments!

Extra - Consider buying me a coffee ☕ before downloading the game!
